about_the_game:
You woke up in a prison cell and do not remember how you got there. Get out of this dark and frightening, full of horror and deadly place of monsters! Which we built ourselves is much more difficult!

GAME FEATURES: Realistic graphics and first-person view, will immerse you in the game as much as possible! That will allow you to feel all the scary moments to goose bumps! And a plot with a deep meaning will leave an aftertaste, maybe pleasant, but maybe not!

Game play: the game consists of several locations (medium size). To move around the location, you have to solve difficult puzzles, hide from monsters, and somewhere even enter into an unequal battle with them. The narration in the game is carried out by dialogues, monologues and some part of the environment (notes, inscriptions, objects).

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains one scene of suicide, arm breaking and a veiled beating.

short_description: Remorse is a first-person psychological horror game. Where you have to get out of an unusual prison, where your jailers are your fears and awakened conscience. But is there a way out of it ...?!
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Japanese
